content.text:
[@lancew](@W87GwaaxNj0PSBbtc5qUm/A/xOO8AWPdNtJn6hzR8s0=.ed25519) 

I just tried to run with `npm start` and I was able to repro a hang while replying to you -- cool! Could you try running `electron index.js` to see it's just an(other) issue with `node_modules/.bin/electron`? I know that the version of Electron in the Arch repos has a handful of patches, so I wonder whether there's a bugfix in there somewhere that's resolving the hang for me.

I've gotta run, but later on I can check and see `npm start` causes hangs under X. At this point I have no trust in the Electron NPM module.
